assessment_item.body: {"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mtf","version":"1.0","templateId":"horizontalMTF"},"data":{"question":{"text":"मिलान कीजिये-","image":"","audio":"","hint":""},"option":{"optionsLHS":[{"text":"सबसे छोटी प्राकृतिक संख्य","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","index":1,"$$hashKey":"object:2290"},{"text":"-13 का योगात्मक प्रतिलोम","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","index":2,"$$hashKey":"object:2291"},{"text":"-17 + 4 का मान","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","index":3,"$$hashKey":"object:2292"},{"text":"-2 ÷ 8 x 4 का मान","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","index":4,"$$hashKey":"object:2311"}],"optionsRHS":[{"text":"1","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","mapIndex":1},{"text":"13","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","mapIndex":2},{"text":"-13","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","mapIndex":3},{"text":"-1","image":"","audio":"","hint":"","mapIndex":4}]},"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"category":"MTF","title":"मिलान कीजिये-","language":["Hindi"],"qlevel":"EASY","gradeLevel":["Grade 6"],"concepts":[{"identifier":"MATH60000","name":"Number_Systems"}],"description":"पूर्णांकों पर आधारित कुछ प्रश्न","max_score":1},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false},"media":[]}}
